com.djammr.westernknights

Class Assets

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.djammr.westernknights.Assets

  • public class Assets
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages a libGDX AssetManager. Load and request assets through this class.
    Use Assets.get(path, type) to load an asset or retrieve it if it exists. See https://github.com/libgdx/libgdx/wiki/Managing-your-assets for more info

      • getFont

        public static com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.BitmapFont getFont(java.lang.String fontID,
                                               java.lang.String defaultPath)
        Gets a font from the cache if it exists otherwise creates it based on the following arguments
        Parameters:
        fontID - id of the font, must be in the format: {ttf-file-name}-{size}
        defaultPath - path to the ttf file used to create the font if it doesn't exist
        Returns:
        the BitmapFont or null if it doesn't exist and no path is provided
